//opcode rs rt jump_address[25:0]
//opcode rs rt immediate_value[15:0]
//opcode rs rt rd  shift_amount function_code
00001100000000000000000000000000//触发input_number_select 
00001100000000000000000000000000//处理输入数据 1
00000100000000000000000000000000//处理输出数据 
00100000000010000000000000000000//addi寄存器$t0 
00100000000000100000000000000001//addi寄存器$v0 
00100000000000110000000000000001//addi寄存器3用来	放1 
00000001000000100001000000011000//mult寄存器$t0,$v0 
00000000010000100000000000010010//mflo从寄存器$v0获取结果 
00000001000000110100000000100010//sub寄存器$t0,3
00010101000000111111111111111100//bne寄存器$t0,3
11111100000000000000000000000000//halt_signal指令
11001100000000000000000000000000//中断指令
11111000000000000000000000000000//关中断
